author: bmclaugh
msg: Set default to be a standalone document.

author: bmclaugh
msg: This is the XMLDocument object that should be the base object for creating XML documents within ECS.  It allows you to work with the prolog of an XML document and the content without having to be ... creative in how the elements are nested.  It is a bit of a Phase I of several, so please coordinate with me on ideas, as I am working on adding support for Cocoon PIs (explicitly) as well as some more things like the DOCTYPE declaration.

author: bmclaugh
msg: Allow the addition of multiple targets to a PI (process instruction).  This allows things like <?xml-stylesheet href="style.xsl" type="text/xsl"

author: mcnally
msg: some elements can turn off pretty printing.  Do not want pretty_print
